intro.title: Featured
intro.subtitle: Academic and personal initiatives that showcase skills and passion.

cards.title: Maze Pathfinding Game
cards.subtitle: Java Programming Project
cards.description: A Java-based maze exploration program that models each room as a connected node and uses recursive graph backtracking to explore every possible path and dead-end. Highlights algorithm design, control flow, and OOP.

cards.title: Student Records Manager
cards.subtitle: Java File I/O Project
cards.description: Console app that manages student records using structured file input/output and buffered streams. Implements robust exception handling and data validation, applying core OOP principles to manage domain entities.

cards.title: E-commerce System with Custom Exceptions
cards.subtitle: Advanced Java OOP Project
cards.description: Interactive shopping simulation showcasing encapsulated classes for products and carts, plus custom exceptions for invalid states (empty carts, insufficient balance). Emphasizes clean class architecture and reusable logic.

cards.title: Pet Adoption Website
cards.subtitle: SOEN 287 Web Development Project
cards.description: Responsive web app where users filter and browse adoptable pets. Built with HTML/CSS/JavaScript (ES6) for the frontend and a lightweight Node.js/Express backend for routing and form handling. Includes client-side validation and dynamic filtering.
